ygData.subject: RE: Pokemon (Blue)  Query
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, not bad lah, it s a fresh break from UO and EQ.  Every night now I m macroing in UO, so the Pokemon give me a very good replacement ;)
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, not bad lah, it's a fresh break from UO and EQ. Every night now I'm macroing in UO, so the Pokemon give me a very good replacement ;)

>

>

>
